## GWAS summary stats

### LDSC format
* Convert GWAS summary stats to the `.sumstats` format using `munge_sumstats.py`
* `ldsc` wiki ["Summary-Statistics-File-Format"](https://github.com/bulik/ldsc/wiki/Partitioned-Heritability)

* Some of the processed GWAS summary stats (`.sumstats` format) can be found on RCC: 
`/project2/xinhe/kevinluo/GWAS/GWAS_summary_stats/GWAS_collection/ldsc_format/`

### torus format
* Some of the processed GWAS summary stats (`torus` format) can be found on RCC: 
`/project2/xinhe/kevinluo/GWAS/GWAS_summary_stats/GWAS_collection/torus_format/`
